title: 32-bit architecture support?
body_html:
There's some discussion pointer pointing out that TensorFlow only supports 64 bit architectures. Is this correct?

Can someone confirm, that given the right dependencies are met, TensorFlow could also run in 32-bit machines?

Thanks,
body_text:
There's some discussion pointer pointing out that TensorFlow only supports 64 bit architectures. Is this correct?
Can someone confirm, that given the right dependencies are met, TensorFlow could also run in 32-bit machines?
Thanks,
body:
There's some discussion [pointer](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33752772/tensorflow-on-raspberry-pi) pointing out that TensorFlow only supports 64 bit architectures. Is this correct?

Can someone confirm, that given the right dependencies are met, TensorFlow could also run in 32-bit machines?

Thanks,
